___time.description: Package release date, in 'YYYY-MM-DD', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' or 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ' format.

___version.description: Package version, see http://semver.org for more info on valid schemes.

___update-type.description: Package update type, either 'minor' for minor releases, 'security' for security issues etc. or a custom type ([a-z0-9-]+) defined by whatever this package applies to.

___include.description: A list of paths to include.

___filemapping.description: List of all files that will be removed, modified or added when upgrading the app.

___changelog.description: List of all changes that will be applied (changelog).
